::Prowl::

Prowl flies further up, a missile passing under him and a few shots
barely missing. He could feel IR's thoughts, and knew that she was
about to transform into her second beast mode, and probably make him
do that too.

IR transformed, and Prowl's transformation was triggered as well,
though this was the first time that he'd been aware of it. His mind
keeps full control as he turns into the 20-ft tall monster that was
his second beast mode.

-You take the one on the ground,- he says to IR, -I'll take the one in
the air.-

Manuevering quickly, Prowl races after Nightstrike.
